p: Aloe vera based herbal formulation of ethyl acetate extract of W. somnifera fruits was prepared to treat alopecia in male Wistar rats. Results showed that good growth of hair follicles was observed due to the anti-oxidant property of the extract. The anti-oxidant activity made the extract suitable for direct use on the skin after testing it for erythema and edema up to 48 hr in rats ( 248).
